string: Inhibition of TYMS was measured as previously described76.
refer: In the sentence provided, "as previously described" refers to the method or procedure used to measure the inhibition of TYMS, which is described in a previous source (reference 76).

string: Inhibition of SHMT1 and SHMT2 was measured as previously described77.
refer: In the sentence provided, "as previously described" refers to the method or procedure used to measure the inhibition of SHMT1 and SHMT2.

string: Formate extraction, derivatization, and quantification was performed using GC-MS analysis as previously described<sup>28</sup>.
refer: In the sentence provided, "as previously described" refers to the method of formate extraction, derivatization, and quantification using GC-MS analysis.

string: Next, the DNA samples were hydrolyzed and dephosphorylated to single nucleosides as previously described (Galashevskaya, A. et al. DNA Repair.
refer: as previously described refers to the method of hydrolyzing and dephosphorylating the DNA samples to single nucleosides.
